column4: i have a quick question, i want to run a server, but no internet, i know what is the fun in that, but is it possible to run web/ftp/file servers w/o internet. of course local only
what is the purpose of a server that doesn't have internet??
i knew somebody would say that, just to play around with it. never did much server stuff, so something to play with
thats understandable, it will be somewhat of a pain to install your server apps w/o internet though
